altername_name: Dylan Dog 08: La Clessidra Di Pietra
name: Dylan Dog: La Clessidra Di Pietra
overview: Dylan Dog 08: La Clessidra Di Pietra is an Action Adventure game, developed and published by Simulmondo, which was released in Europe in 1993. James, a quiet middle-aged employee suddenly turns into a winged monster and tears apart his boring wife, somehow becoming the "director" of a daring time trap for young Sinead, who relives the same events every day aware of such a nightmare, so much so that he turned to Dylan Dog, more skeptical than usual on the proposed case. Several characters are involved in Sinead's nightmare who cross their lives with each other, each with some strange power.
